GK22vidsrgpu:407: haṃsa-śreṇi-kutūhalena kalayan bhūṣā-kapālāvalīṃ bālām indukalāṃ mṛṇāla-rabhasād āndolayan pāṇinā /
GK22vidsrgpu:408: raktāmbhoja-dhiyā ca locana-puṭaṃ lālāṭam udghāṭayan pāyād vaḥ pitur aṅka-bhāk śiśu-jana-krīḍonmukhaḥ ṣaṇ-mukhaḥ // VidSrk_5.22 *(92) //
GK22vidsrgpu:411: kapolād uḍḍīnair bhaya-vaśa-vilolair madhukarair madāmbhaḥ-saṃlobhād upari patituṃ baddha-paṭalaiḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:412: calad-barha-cchatra-śriyam iva dadhāno 'tirucirām avighnaṃ herambo jagad-agha-vighātaṃ ghaṭayatu // VidSrk_5.23 *(93) //
GK22vidsrgpu:414: ekaḥ sa eva paripālayatāj jaganti gaurī-girīśa-caritānukṛtiṃ dadhānaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:417: arciṣmanti vidārya vaktra-kuharāṇy āsṛk-kvaṇo vāsukes tarjanyā viṣa-karburān gaṇayataḥ saṃspṛśya dantāṅkurān /
GK22vidsrgpu:418: ekaṃ trīṇi navāṣṭa sapta ṣaḍ-ativyastāsta-saṃkhyā-kramā vācaḥ śaktidharasya śaiśava-kalāḥ kurvantu vo maṅgalam // VidSrk_5.25 *(95) //
GK22vidsrgpu:420: suptaṃ pakṣa-puṭe nilīna-śirasaṃ sṛṣṭvā mayūraṃ puraḥ kṛttaṃ kena śiro
GK22vidsrgpu:423: tan-mūrdhekṣaṇa-tarpitasya hasitaṃ pāyāt kumārasya vaḥ // VidSrk_5.26
GK22vidsrgpu:425: carcāyāḥ katham eṣa rakṣati sadā sadyo nṛ-muṇḍa-srajaṃ caṇḍīkeśariṇo vṛṣaṃ ca bhujagān sūnor mayūrād api /
GK22vidsrgpu:426: ity antaḥparibhāvayan bhagavato dīrghaṃ dhiyaḥ kauśalaṃ kūṣmāṇḍo
GK22vidsrgpu:429: kasmāt tvaṃ tāta gehād aparam abhinavā brūhi kā tatra vārtā devyā devo jitaḥ kiṃ vṛṣa-ḍamaru-citā-bhasma-bhogīndra-candrān
GK22vidsrgpu:430: ity evaṃ barhināthe kathayati sahasā bhartṛ-bhikṣā vibhūṣā
GK22vidsrgpu:431: vaiguṇyodvega-janmā jagad avatu ciraṃ hāravo bhṛṅgirīṭeḥ // VidSrk_5.28
GK22vidsrgpu:433: sthūlo dūramayaṃ na yāsyati kṛśo naiṣa prayāṇa-kṣamas tenaikasya mamaiva tatra kaśipu-prāptiḥ parā dṛśyate /
GK22vidsrgpu:434: ity ādau paricintitaṃ pratimuhus tad-bhṛṅgi-kūṣmāṇḍayor anyonya-pratikūlam
GK22vidsrgpu:442: yātas te 'dhara-khaṇḍanāt paribhavaḥ kāpālikād amba yaḥ sa brahmādiṣu
GK22vidsrgpu:443: kathyatām iti muhur vāṇīṃ guhe jalpati /
GK22vidsrgpu:444: gaurīṃ hasta-yugena ṣaṇ-mukha-vaco roddhuṃ nirīkṣyākṣamāṃ vailakṣyāc
GK22vidsrgpu:447: gonāsāya viyojitāgadarajāḥ sarpāya baddhauṣadhiḥ pāṇisthāya viṣāya vīryamahate kaṇṭhe maṇiṃ bibhratī /
GK22vidsrgpu:449: vivāha-samaye prītā ca bhītā ca vaḥ // VidSrk_5.32 *(102) //
GK22vidsrgpu:452: dig-vāsā yadi tat kim asya dhanuṣā sāstrasya kiṃ bhasmanā bhasmāṅgasya kim aṅganā yadi ca sā kāmaṃ paridveṣṭi kim /
GK22vidsrgpu:453: ity anyonya-viruddha-ceṣṭitam idaṃ paśyan nija-svāmino bhṛṅgī
GK22vidsrgpu:460: krīḍā-kroḍa-tanor navendu-viśade daṃṣṭrāṅkure yasya bhūr bhāti sma pralayābdhi-palvala-talotkhātaika-mustākṛtiḥ vākpatirājasya |
GK22vidsrgpu:462: pṛṣṭha-bhrāmyad amanda-mandara-giri-grāvāgra-kaṇḍūyanān nidrāloḥ kamaṭhākṛter bhagavataḥ śvāsānilāḥ pāntu vaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:463: yat-saṃskāra-kalānuvartana-vaśād velā-chalenāmbhasāṃ yātāyātam ayantritaṃ jala-nidher nādyāpi viśrāmyati // VidSrk_6.2 *(105) //
GK22vidsrgpu:470: viramati mahā-kalpe nābhī-pathaika-niketanas tribhuvana-puraḥ-śilpī yasya pratikṣaṇam ātmabhūḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:471: kim adhikaraṇā kīdṛk kasya vyavasthitir ity asā- vudaram aviśad draṣṭuṃ
GK22vidsrgpu:475: rādhe tvaṃ kupitā tvam eva kupitā ruṣṭāsi bhūmer yato mātā tvaṃ jagatāṃ tvam eva jagatāṃ mātā na vijño 'paraḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:476: devi tvaṃ parihāsa-keli-kalahe 'nantā tvam evety asau smero
GK22vidsrgpu:477: vallava-sundarīm avanamac chauriḥ śriyaḥ vaḥ kriyāt // VidSrk_6.5 *(108)
GK22vidsrgpu:480: ko 'yaṃ dvāri hariḥ prayāhy upavanaṃ śākhāmṛgeṇātra kiṃ kṛṣṇo 'haṃ dayite bibhemi sutarāṃ kṛṣṇaḥ kathaṃ vānaraḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:481: mugdhe 'haṃ madhusūdano vraja latāṃ tām eva puṣpāsavām itthaṃ nirvacanīkṛto dayitayā hrīṇo hariḥ pātu vaḥ // VidSrk_6.6 *(109) //
GK22vidsrgpu:484: mandra-kvāṇita-veṇur ahni śithile vyāvartayan gokulaṃ barhāpīḍakam uttamāṅga-racitaṃ godhūli-dhumraṃ dadhat /
GK22vidsrgpu:486: gopa-strī-nayanotsavo vitaratu śreyāṃsi vaḥ keśavaḥ // VidSrk_6.7 *(110)
GK22vidsrgpu:490: niryāto vadanena kukṣi-vasateḥ patyus talād arṇasāṃ śaṅkho
GK22vidsrgpu:493: yasya puraḥ sura-kariṇaḥ sāṅkura-māṣopamā jātāḥ // VidSrk_6.9 *(112) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:496: yair vyāvṛtya patadbhir aurva-śikhinas tejo-jaṭālaṃ vapuḥ pānādhmāna-vaśād
GK22vidsrgpu:498: kutas tvam aṇukaḥ svataḥ svam iti kiṃ na yat kasyacit kim icchasi
GK22vidsrgpu:499: pada-trayaṃ nanu bhuvā kim ity alpayā /
GK22vidsrgpu:500: dvijasya śamino mama tribhuvanaṃ tad ity āśayo harer jayati nihnutaḥ prakaṭitaś ca vakroktibhiḥ (Skmsa.u.ka. 213, vākpateḥ)
GK22vidsrgpu:501: śreyo 'syāś ciram astu mandara-girer māghāni pāśrvair iyaṃ māvaṣṭambhi mahormibhiḥ phaṇipater māle 'pi lālā-viṣaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:502: ity ākūta-juṣaḥ śriyaṃ jala-nidher ardhotthitāṃ paśyato vācontaḥ-sphuritā
GK22vidsrgpu:503: bahir vikṛtibhir vyaktā hareḥ pātu vaḥ // VidSrk_6.12 *(115) //
GK22vidsrgpu:505: caṭac-caṭini carmaṇi ccham iti cocchala-cchoṇite dhagad-dhag iti medasi sphuṭataro 'sthiṣu ṣṭhād iti /
GK22vidsrgpu:512: nakṣatra-karbura-viyat-pratirodhi-nindad- unnidra-kairava-taḍāgam uro murāreḥ // VidSrk_6.14 murāreḥ --
GK22vidsrgpu:513: bhramati girirāṭ pṛṣṭhe garjaty upaśruti sāgaro dahati vitata-jvālā-jālo
GK22vidsrgpu:515: sa tu vinihita-grīvākāṇḍaḥ kaṭāha-puṭāntare svapiti bhagavān kūrmo
GK22vidsrgpu:520: lāvaṇyasya mahā-nidhī rasikatāṃ lakṣmī-dṛśos tanvatī yuṣmākaṃ kurutāṃ
GK22vidsrgpu:521: bhavārti-śamanaṃ netre tanur vā hareḥ // VidSrk_6.16 *(119) //
GK22vidsrgpu:524: yasminn uddharati śrutīḥ pṛthutarād oṅkāra-sāra-dhvaner madhye-sindhu
GK22vidsrgpu:525: viyan-mayo jala-mayaḥ stambhas tv abhūd ambare // VidSrk_6.17 *(120) //
GK22vidsrgpu:530: mayānviṣṭo dhūrtaḥ sa sakhi nikhilām eva rajanīm iha syād atra syād iti nipuṇam anyām abhisṛtaḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:531: na dṛṣṭo bhāṇḍīre taṭa-bhuvi na govardhana-girer na kālindyāḥ kūle na ca nicula-kuñje muraripuḥ śyāmoccandrā svapiti na śiśo naiti mām amba nidrā nidrāhetoḥ śṛṇu suta kathāṃ kām apūrvāṃ kuruṣva /
GK22vidsrgpu:532: vyaktaḥ stambhān naraharir abhūd dānavaṃ dārayiṣyann ity uktasya smitam udayate devakī-nandanasya śatānandasya |
GK22vidsrgpu:536: pātrāvāpti-samutsukena balinā sānandam ālokitaṃ pāyād vaḥ krama-vardhamāna-mahimāścaryaṃ murārer vapuḥ // VidSrk_6.21 *(124) //
GK22vidsrgpu:538: uttiṣṭhantyā ratānte bharam uragapatau pāṇinaikena kṛtvā dhṛtvā cānyena vāso vigalita-kabarī-bhāram aṃśaṃ vahantyāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:539: bhūyas tat-kāla-kānti-dviguṇita-surata-prītinā śauriṇā vaḥ śayyām ālambya nītaṃ vapur alasa-lasad-bāhu lakṣmyāḥ punātu // VidSrk_6.22 *(125) //
GK22vidsrgpu:542: saṃpūrṇaḥ punar abhyudeti kiraṇair indus tato dantinaḥ kumbha-dvandvam
GK22vidsrgpu:547: bha-bha-bhramati medinī la-la-la-landate candramāḥ kṛ-kṛṣṇa vavada drutaṃ ha-ha-hasanti kiṃ vṛṣṇayaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:548: sisīdhu mu-mu-muñca me pa-pa-pa-pāna-pātre sthitaḥ mada-skhalitam ālapan
GK22vidsrgpu:552: kiṃ kiṃ siṃhas tataḥ kiṃ nara-sadṛśa-vapur deva citraṃ gṛhīto naivaṃ tat ko 'tra jīva drutam upanaya taṃ nanv ayaṃ prāpta eva /
GK22vidsrgpu:553: cāpaṃ cāpaṃ na khaḍgaṃ tvaritataram aho karkaśatvaṃ nakhānām itthaṃ daityādhirājaṃ nija-nakha-kuliśair jaghnivān yas sa vo 'vyāt //
GK22vidsrgpu:556: devas tvām eka-jaṅghāvalayita-laguḍo mūrdhni vinyasta-bāhur gāyan
GK22vidsrgpu:563: vicintya yeṣāṃ caritaṃ surārayaḥ priyā-nakhebhyo 'pi rateṣu bibhyati //
GK22vidsrgpu:565: ete lakṣmaṇa jānakī-virahiṇaṃ māṃ khedayanty ambudā marmāṇīva ca ghaṭṭayanty alam amī krūrāḥ kadambānilāḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:566: itthaṃ vyāhṛta-pūrva-janma-viraho yo rādhayā vīkṣitaḥ serṣyaṃ śaṅkitayā sa
GK22vidsrgpu:570: mithyā-kaṇḍūti-sācīkṛta-gala-saraṇir yeṣu jāto garutmān ye nidrāṃ nāṭayadbhiḥ śayana-phaṇi-phaṇair lakṣitā na śrutāś ca /
GK22vidsrgpu:571: ye ca dhyānānubandha-cchala-mukula-dṛśā vedhasā naiva dṛṣṭās te lakṣmīṃ narmayanto nidhuvana-vidhayaḥ pāntu vo mādhavasya // VidSrk_6.29 *(132) //
GK22vidsrgpu:576: nidrā-cchedābhitāmrā ciram avatu harer dṛṣṭir ākekarā vaḥ // VidSrk_6.30
GK22vidsrgpu:578: daṃṣṭrāpiṣṭeṣu sadyaḥ śikhariṣu na kṛtaḥ skandha-kaṇḍū-vinodaḥ sindhuṣv aṅgāvagāhaḥ khura-kuhara-viśat-toya-tuccheṣu nāptaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:579: prāptāḥ pātāla-paṅke na luṭhanaratayaḥ potramātropayukte yenoddhāre dharitryāḥ sa jayati vibhutā-vighniteccho varāhaḥ // VidSrk_6.31 *(134) //
GK22vidsrgpu:585: yasyotsphāla-kutūhalena katham apy aṅgeṣu jīrṇāyitam // VidSrk_6.32 *(135)
GK22vidsrgpu:588: ye saṃtāpita-nābhi-padma-madhavo ye snāpitoraḥ-srajo ye tāpāt taralena
GK22vidsrgpu:590: ye rādhā-smṛti-sākṣiṇaḥ kamalayā sāsūyam ākarṇitā gāḍhāntar-davathoḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:591: pratapta-saralāḥ śvāsā hareḥ pāntu vaḥ // VidSrk_6.33 *(136) //
GK22vidsrgpu:593: seyaṃ dyos tad idaṃ śaśāṅka-dina-kṛc-cihnaṃ nabhaḥ sā kṣitis
GK22vidsrgpu:594: tat-pātāla-talaṃ ta eva girayas te 'mbhodharās tā diśaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:595: itthaṃ nābhi-vinirgatena sa-śiraḥ-kampādbhutaṃ vedhasā yasyāntaś ca bahiś ca dṛṣṭam akhilaṃ trailokyam avyāt sa vaḥ // VidSrk_6.34 *(137) //
GK22vidsrgpu:598: yuktaṃ mānada mām ananya-manasaṃ vakṣaḥ-sthalasthāyinīṃ bhaktām apy avadhūya kartum adhunā kāntā-sahasraṃ tava /
GK22vidsrgpu:599: ity uktvā phaṇa-bhṛt phaṇāmaṇi-gatāṃ svām eva matvā tanuṃ
GK22vidsrgpu:600: nidrā-ccheda-karaṃ harer avatu vo lakṣmyā vilakṣa-smitam // VidSrk_6.35
GK22vidsrgpu:602: agre gacchata dhenu-dugdha-kalaśān ādāya gopyo gṛhaṃ dugdhe vaskayaṇī-kule
GK22vidsrgpu:604: ity anya-vyapadeśa-gupta-hṛdayaḥ kurvan viviktaṃ vrajaṃ devaḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:605: kāraṇa-nanda-sūnur aśivaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sa muṣṇātu vaḥ // VidSrk_6.36 *(139) //
GK22vidsrgpu:606: satrāsarti yaśodayā priya-guṇa-prītekṣaṇaṃ rādhayā lagnair vallava-sūnubhiḥ sarabhasaṃ saṃbhāvitātmorjitaiḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:607: bhītānandita-vismitena viṣamaṃ nandena cālokitaḥ pāyād vaḥ kara-padma-susthita-mahā-śailaḥ salīlo hariḥ // VidSrk_6.37 *(140) //
GK22vidsrgpu:623: harer apara-keśari-kṣubhita-cetasaḥ pātu vaḥ saroṣa-lalitādhara-bhrukuṭi-bhaṅga-bhīmaṃ mukham // VidSrk_6.40 *(143) //
GK22vidsrgpu:625: vatsa kṣmādhara-gahvareṣu vicaran cāra-pracāre gavāṃ hiṃsrān vīkṣya puraḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:627: ity uktasya yaśodayā murāripor avyāj jaganti sphurad-
GK22vidsrgpu:630: devo harir jayati yajña-varāha-rūpaḥ sṛṣṭi-sthiti-pralaya-kāraṇam eka eva /
GK22vidsrgpu:631: yasyodara-sthita-jagat-traya-bīja-kośa- nirgacchad-aṅkura-śikheva vibhāti daṃṣṭrā // VidSrk_6.42 sonnokasya --
GK22vidsrgpu:632: bījaṃ brahmaiva devo madhujala-nidhayaḥ karṇikā svarṇa-śailaḥ kando nāgādhirājo viyad api vipulaḥ patrakośāvakāśaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:633: dvīpāḥ patrāṇi meghā madhupakulam abhūt tārakā-garbha-dhūlir
GK22vidsrgpu:634: yasyaitan-nābhi-padmaṃ bhuvanam iti sa vaḥ śarma devo dadhātu //
GK22vidsrgpu:644: yasyādhodhas tathoparyupari niravadhi bhrāmyato viśvam aśvair
GK22vidsrgpu:647: uddaṇḍaiḥ prāpayan vaḥ pracuratama-tamaḥ-stomam astaṃ samastam //
GK22vidsrgpu:650: maṇḍalam uditaṃ vande kuṇḍalam ākhaṇḍalāśāyāḥ // VidSrk_7.2 *(149) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:653: saṃsāra-sāgara-samutkramiyogisārtha- prasthāna-pūrṇa-kalasāya namaḥ savitre // VidSrk_7.3 varāha-mihirasya || (Skmsa.u.ka. 6)
GK22vidsrgpu:656: arkālokaḥ kriyād vo mudaṃ udaya-śiraś cakravālālavālād
GK22vidsrgpu:664: apy ete sahakāra-saurabha-muco vācālitāḥ kokilair āyānti
GK22vidsrgpu:674: utkalikā utkalikāś cetasi janayanti lokasya // VidSrk_8.3 *(154) //*
GK22vidsrgpu:675: kāntena prahito navaḥ priya-sakhī-vargeṇa baddha-spṛhaś cittenopahṛtaḥ smarāya na samutsraṣṭuṃ gataḥ pāṇinā /
GK22vidsrgpu:676: āmṛṣṭo muhur īkṣito muhur abhighrāto muhur loṭhitaḥ pratyaṅgaṃ ca muhuḥ kṛto mṛgadṛśā kiṃ kiṃ na cūtāṅkuraḥ // VidSrk_8.4 *(155) //
GK22vidsrgpu:678: dvis triḥ kokilayā rutaṃ tri-caturaiś cūtāṅkurair udgataṃ koṣād bobhrati kiṃśukā madhukara-śreṇī-juṣaḥ pañcaṣān /
GK22vidsrgpu:684: eteṣām api paśya kiṃśukataroḥ patrair abhinna-tviṣāṃ puṣpa-bhrāntibhir
GK22vidsrgpu:690: yāḥ kṛcchrād abhilaṅghya lubdhaka-bhayāt tair eva reṇūtkarair
GK22vidsrgpu:693: aśithila-parispandaḥ kunde tathaiva madhuvrato nayana-suhṛdo vṛkṣāś caite na kuḍmala-śālinaḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:694: dalati kalikā cautī nāsmin tathā mṛga-cakṣuṣāṃ atha ca hṛdaye
GK22vidsrgpu:696: kāntāṃ hitvā viraha-vidhurārambha-khedālasāṅgīṃ māṃ ullaṅghya vrajatu
GK22vidsrgpu:698: ity āśokī jagati sakale vallarī cīrikeva prāptārambhe kusuma-samaye
GK22vidsrgpu:700: mandaṃ dakṣiṇam āhvayanti pavanaṃ puṃskokila-vyāhṛtaiḥ saṃskurvanti
GK22vidsrgpu:702: candraṃ sundarayanti mukta-tuhina-prāvārayā jyotsnayā vardhante ca
GK22vidsrgpu:703: vivardhayanti ca muhus te 'mī smaraṃ vāsarāḥ // VidSrk_8.10 *(161) //
GK22vidsrgpu:705: hṛdya-snigdhaiḥ parabhṛta-rutair mukta-dīrgha-pravāsaḥ pratyāvṛtto madhur iti vadan dakṣiṇo gandhavāhaḥ /
GK22vidsrgpu:708: lolaiḥ kokila-maṇḍalair madhu-lihāṃ cañcūryamāṇair gaṇair nīrandhrair
GK22vidsrgpu:710: prārabdhe timire vasanta-samaya-kṣoṇīpater bhrāmyataḥ prasnigdhā parito
GK22vidsrgpu:713: cyuta-sumanasaḥ kundāḥ puṣpodgameṣv alasā drumā manasi ca giraṃ grathnantīme kiranti na kokilāḥ
GK22vidsrgpu:714: atha ca savituḥ śītollāsaṃ lunanti marīcayo na ca jaṭharatām ālambante
GK22vidsrgpu:716: sāmyaṃ saṃprati sevate vicakilaṃ ṣāṇmāsikair mauktikair
GK22vidsrgpu:718: bhṛṅgā-laṅghita-koṭi kiṃśukam idaṃ kiṃcid vivṛntāyate māñjiṣṭhair mukulaiś
